title: Bugsplat into low priority queue
body: Why is it so that if I get bugsplat and reconnect just before they vote for remake, that I still get the leaver penalty`?

replies.body: It sounds like you were away for long enough to be marked as a leaver, unfortunately.  Getting a bugsplat sucks, and I'd like to help troubleshoot so it doesn't happen again.  :(  Our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help with this by ruling out most common cases like outdated drivers or bad game files.  I recommend testing it in a custom game, though, to prevent anymore leaver penalties.  I hope that helps!
